attributes.action: help people who have worked all their lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people who have worked and paid taxes all their lives and then get made redundant still have to pay mortgage and bill with no money coming in, but if you are a drug addict or lazy and cant be bothered working you get EVERYTHING paid for you please help people who have worked all there lives to get help with mortgage and bill

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
